Package ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels

Class Player

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels.Player
public final class Player extends Object
Represents a user model.

      Returns:

      Throws:

    • hasGoldTokensCountingForTwo

      public boolean hasGoldTokensCountingForTwo()

      Returns:
      true if player has five additional points, false otherwise.

      true if player has a ShieldColor, false otherwise.
